name: Schmidt and Gladstone Law Office

overview:
If you find yourself in a situation in which you need to go to Court, give our Salt Lake City attorneys a call (801) 895-3113 to receive a FREE CONSULTATION!

Schmidt & Gladstone Law Firm is conveniently located in down town Salt Lake City. Our Utah attorneys have the experience and integrity to help you navigate your case and get you the best result possible. Schmidt & Gladstone is backed by over 18 years of experience in family law, child support services, immigration cases, criminal defense and the best DUI attorneys this side of the Rockies.

Attorney Special: $1500 Flat-Fee Uncontested Divorce Service from Attorney Tyler Moore - Call Today! (801) 895-3113

Professional Associations and Memberships Utah County Food & Care Coalition, Member, Board of Directors Utah Domestic Violence Counsel, Member Member of the Family Law Executive Committee Member of the Family Law Journal Committee Pro Bono Lawyer for the Davis County Domestic Violence Project

Salt Lake City Attorney Specialties at Schmidt and Gladstone Law Firm Utah Adoption Child Support Enforcement & Adjustment Criminal Defense Attorney Utah DUI Attorney Custody Disputes Divorce Attorney Estate Planning Family Law Immigration Personal Injury Visitation Enforcement Business Litigation
